detailedSolution:
This tessellation could be produced with a reflection of the triangle vertically, then each triangle is rotated <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>180</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{180^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math> and translated to the right.
